    Implementation for embedding a Neo4j graph database in an application.

  • Classes in org.neo4j.kernel.api.exceptions used by org.neo4j.kernel 
    Class and Description
    KernelException
    A super class of checked exceptions coming from the Kernel API.
  • Classes in org.neo4j.kernel.api.exceptions used by org.neo4j.kernel.api 
    Class and Description
    TransactionFailureException
    This class (in its current form - 2013-05-07) is a vector for exceptions thrown by a transaction manager, for carrying the exception through the Kernel API stack to be rethrown on a higher level.
  • Classes in org.neo4j.kernel.api.exceptions used by org.neo4j.kernel.api.exceptions
